speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, today I recognize Tyler Custis, an intern in my Washington, DC, office, for all of the hard work he has done for me, my staff, and the State of South Dakota over the past several months.

Tyler is a graduate of Custer High School in Custer, SD. He is a recent graduate of Texas A&M University where he majored in economics. He is a hard worker who has been dedicated to getting the most out of his internship experience.
I would like to extend my sincere thanks and appreciation to Tyler for all of the fine work he has done and wish him continued success in the years to come.
